channel.title: Xscape Devolpment Team
channel.description:
Xscape, the server i am currently devolping am trying to make it harder than most private servers with an economy and working for your items/skill levels. Also to add in as many of the coll features Rs offers in membership without paying. So I am looking to start a devolpment team to make my server as cool, fun, and full of features as possible. Need up to 10 coders to work with voids and atleast 1 person that knows how place objects (walls, gates, trees, foutains, ect.) using Fedexers global items void, i think it is.
Post here or pm to join
Current goals
To make hunting, construction, and summoning all on the music tab using the buttons to switch
Full Barrows with killing and random rewards
Castle Wars
Pest Control
A Gunning skill
Makeing logout 3 min after inactivity
Adding quests such as Desert Trseure, Monkey Madness, Lunar Dimoplacy, Hero's, Legend's, ect
Chat from most NPCs
Tresure Trails
Skill Capes (Real Item)
More to come these are on the top of my head.

item.description:
@BaracudaX wrote:

ye you are right but i guess you cant set yoru goals to high…

i was wondering why we couldnt have real hunting or construction yet

how do they get updated caches?[br][size=1]Posted on: April 16, 2007, 02:46:48 PM[/size][hr]somebody try to log into my server

should be up use 43594 and ip is xscape.seregame.org

i have been told that one doesnt work so try 216.180.76.115

Read full topic
